sentences.english: Chen Ziang is one of the most outstanding prose writers in the Sui, Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 陈子昂是隋唐五代巴蜀最优秀的散文家之一。

sentences.english: Following Chen Ziang, He Zhizhang is the only one who take the responsibility of the reformation of poem style.
sentences.chinese: 继陈子昂之后，他是自觉地承担起诗风改革的又一人。
